website_summaries.verdict: A budget-priced model from Fender. More quality control issues with this model than the Epiphone.
pros: Extremely affordable Fender with good specs
cons: Some incidents of crooked neck and other minor factory flaws

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the low price fool you. Excellent for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know anything about guitars,I don't play. I bought this because my boyfriend is a Fender fan (playing for about 30 years) and this is what we could afford. I gave this to him for his birthday and he's super impressed!!! It's not the best guitar that he ever had but, for the money, he's thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Bad item sent
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in good condition. After opening I noticed a lot of scratches and black finger prints on the white part of the guitar. The fretboard had glue smudges and looked discolored at multiple frets. When I plugged it into the amp there was a continuous humming sound. The 2 tone controls seemed to have no effect on the sound. Upon playing with different settings (on amp and guitar) I didn't hear the sound expected of an electric guitar (lead, bass etc). It seemed like a patched used guitar was shipped. I've returned this and ordered a replacement; hopefully the next one is in a better shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a Strat Plus from 1990 that I don't like carrying around in public
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second guitar, I have a Strat Plus from 1990 that I don't like carrying around in public. That being said, this is a solid guitar for the price and arrived in ready-to-play condition.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Fitst-Time Guitar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this guitar based on previous ratings and the users didn't disappoint. This Strat is well-built, keeps it's tuning well, and arrived well-boxed with no concerns for it being damaged in shipment. I haven't changed the strings yet, but it looks easy enough. This would be great for any beginner, like me. I wanted a guitar that wasn't expensive being I never played before and wasn't sure I could due to a disability. It was a great choice. I would go with a more expensive Squire or Fender as I grow with experience, but this is a good model to get started with.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bennett

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner electric guitarist. So for me it is great! Came wrapped up and in a large long box. So far I am happy with it. I didn't want to spend very much and I wanted something light weight. This fits the bill. Love the color. I am just a beginner , so when I am able to take it to a shop I will to see if it needs anything. But sounds great to me right out of the box! Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only six months in and I've gotten very comfortable with this guitar and I have no problems with it. My first thought when looking at this guitar was that maybe its too expensive but that's NOT TRUE! Getting a cheap guitar with a billion other attachments and addons is not reliable. Trust me, some of my friends started the wrong way with one of those guitars and they only lasted a couple of months before something went wrong. I have already strongly recommended this guitar to multiple friends and in the end, they're all happy that they bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Needs a little work, but well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Fender Starcaster, Stratocaster, Telecaster, Gibson ES-335, J-45, Martin 000-28-EC, Martin DR2E, Taylor T5z and Taylor GS Mini. This little gem is my favorite now. After doing some fretboard work and replacing all the electronics and pickups, Seymour Duncan, CTS pots. I'm going to be ordering another Bullet Mustang and throw some Tele pickups and electronics. It's light weight makes it easier to handle and play.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Blue

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I'll start with the bad. I recieved it with a few small scratches on the white part, so I noticed it quite fast, other than that I can't complain at all. It feels great, the neck is very smooth and beautiful. Also lightweight and absolutely fun to play. It's exactly what I expected, plus some. I highly recommend it for any beginner looking to play guitar, or any experienced player who wants an extra guitar for a cheap price!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner guitar for my 16 year old
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 16 year old son. He loves it. He self taught himself guitar around August and asked for this for Christmas. Since he’s a beginner I didn’t want to spend hundreds of dollars. He was impressed with it and is always playing it. It looks way more expensive than it is. Very good quality. Shipping was great too. It was protected in its box.
customer_reviews.author: jason thomas

customer_reviews.title: We'll worth the money. Now do a VH replica for same price.  Ok $5 more :-)
customer_reviews.text: My oldest boy sold his guitar when he needed money going to college. I bought this for a gift for him not knowing if he still played. He does and loves it! Now if they only made a Van Halen copy Frankenstein then this old guy would be in heaven for that price. I don't even play guitar anymore but I'd buy a VH replica for my man cave!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Metz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for amateur guitarist
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my son. Years ago he had bought a used guitar that was much more expensive when it was new, played it for a few years, then sold it. I thought he missed having a guitar so I got this one for him. He said it was not a $1000 guitar, but he was thrilled with it. I am glad that he is back into his music again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great guitar, and it's a lot of fun to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great guitar, and it's a lot of fun to play. My only complaint is that the plastic over the pick guard is a little hard to remove when you first open the box.
customer_reviews.author: RndChris

customer_reviews.title: Good little beginner guitar but...
customer_reviews.text: ...the pickup POLES and pickup screws are RUSTY!! Are you kidding me? Granted it was an Amazon Warehouse deal BUT there was nothing in the description that indicated this. This is a nice little guitar for beginners. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Shezmaster

customer_reviews.title: Close To Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best electric guitars you can buy for the money. It's also one of the most upgradable. I bought this for my son, might just have to get one for myself. Pickups and tuners will probably get upgraded some day but plays and sounds like a strat right out of the box. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PatrickWinn

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I’ve played knockoffs before and was prepared for a lot of setup. However, this was great out of the box! Action is great, intonation is spot on and all settings work! I’m exclusively an acoustic player, but will be doing an oldies show and a Buddy Holly tribute show - this guitar is perfect! So glad I didn’t spring for a $500 Mexican Strat!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred C. Eilersen

customer_reviews.title: We did some things to soup it up but it is a great starter guitar
customer_reviews.text: Some of the things my friend did were smooth the fret edges, restring and raise/measure some of the actions? Basically just did some stuff to take a $150 guitar and turn it into a $250 guitar. I have no issues with it, I think it is great, especially for my purposes. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JLOW

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT STARTER or HOBBY instrument
customer_reviews.text: I got this specifically so I can do quick guitar tracks (I'm a bass player, so I can already "roughly" play guitar. The neck feels great. The instrument is light and well made. And it was really simple to adjust the action, making it super-playable within an hour.
customer_reviews.author: John Meadows

customer_reviews.title: It’s rough
customer_reviews.text: The decal has changed. Looks even cheaper than before. Amazon needs to update their picture. Fret edges are sharp. A little on the heavy end. Wonky tuners. Going to try to make it work. May have to return it. It’s rough
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Rock steady beginner instrument
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners, short scale makes the strings easier to play and encourages students to actually stick with it. You don’t build finger strength as fast as learning on acoustic but you also won’t get frustrated and quit after two days. Good value for the money if you want a guitar to rock out on. Humbuckers will give a different tone than single coils so think about that before you buy, this won’t have as much “twang”
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good guitar
customer_reviews.text: Good basic Squier guitar, no complaints at all. Needed a little set up, as you would expect. Plays very nice.
customer_reviews.author: sjbrn1Top Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Sticker adhesive damages the pick guard!
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive for the sticker on the pick guard advertising Fender's online lessons damages the pick guard. Since it was brand new, I retuned it. Fender needs to use a different adhesive or use a different way to advertise their online lessons .
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric guitar and I'd say it's the best for beginners looking for a strat. It's not too expensive and it sounds fine for me. Fretboard was a little dry when I got it but I've since taken it to a shop to get it setup (cost me $40). Definitely consider this as an option if you're looking for a first guitar!
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: This guitar is very easy and fun to play. We bought it for our 10 year old son and his playing increased significantly right away. Tuners work surprisingly well and has hold the tune since day 1. I would expect a better quality neck finish but it is excellent value for the price regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Orkun Toros

customer_reviews.title: got a used one?
customer_reviews.text: Got mine today and it was in awful condition - entire plastic front had tons of scratches and some ink stains, overall condition was extremely poor.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy I

customer_reviews.title: Well worth cost but nothing extra with it. No strap
customer_reviews.text: Woulda gave a 5 star but there’s scratches on the front white part. Others same issue. Hope not used. But plays well. Sound is great. Good beginner or intermediate guitar
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A must for beginners, or even intermediate players
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this guitar. I have been playing for a long time, and bought this guitar to show you didn’t need a $650 mainstream Fender Stratocaster to sound good and that a $150 can sound almost as good. And proove it does. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive guitar for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived without need of additional setup, and it sounds great. My only complaint is that tuning pegs are a bit sloppy; they'll hold tune, but tuning itself is a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Was packaged by mfg like this
customer_reviews.text: Very serious damage. Had to be packaged that way by mfg. no quality country. No pride in product.
customer_reviews.author: ROGER GAGNON

customer_reviews.title: Amazing guitar for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Guitar was perfect i loved it. And it arrived in less than 24 hrs. Have been playing it an it feels great and easy to learn with. This is an amazing guitar for beginners i strongly recommend. Get it with a blackstar ID core 10 amp they both perfect together
customer_reviews.author: efe ukoli

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a guitar before or even played one, but this is one of my new favorite hobbies. I don't have anything to compare it too, but this guitar just feels good when playing. For this price it is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The price will get you a decent guitar. The white plastic was a bit scratched (only visible up-close) and I wish it staid in tune a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: DDT

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar for a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 9 year old daughter's first guitar. Much nicer than the guitar I learned on 40 years ago. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Deleuze

customer_reviews.title: great guitar at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome axe. Been playing guitar off and on since I was 12. Now in my 60s. This is one of the better guitars I've had. Sounds great too
customer_reviews.author: DarrelR

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt really hold tunning well. Sounds just like an inexpensive SG. No frills.
customer_reviews.author: Lew Orbach

customer_reviews.title: My son absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great electric guitar for the price. Great for beginners and just a great value overall.
customer_reviews.author: JamrockZX7R

customer_reviews.title: Even better than what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best guitars you can get for beginner or mid-tier.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar for beginner or advanced players.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best bang for my buck I have ever gotten in a guitar, just needed to tune it up and it was ready to go right out if the box, the action was even at the height that I like. And it's just beautiful. Still can't believe I got it at the price I did, will be a great backup guitar to my Les Paul studio. Delivery was awesome, thanx again Amazon 👍🎸
customer_reviews.author: shon

customer_reviews.title: Playability
customer_reviews.text: Got this guitar to start doing lead runs during worship at my church, I love every part of it mis h more than a beginner guitar
customer_reviews.author: Eric Newton

customer_reviews.title: Pros cons/ quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality for a beginners guitar. Won’t recommend for the professionals but good sound with amp or no amp... needs to be tuned often for the first couple weeks - just until the strings are broken in... highly recommend getting a guitar strap because the guitar is kinda heavy. But for the most part just have fun with it! I sure am!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kid is very happy with it. Looks great and seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice guitar for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say besides that it's a Fender, but made in china. Sounds great, plays great; I got a "used" one for $100 and it had no defects apart from a little something around the neck. There are surely better guitars for a higher price, but if you're starting out this is more than good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Great finish.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Great finish and sounds good too.
customer_reviews.author: Klem

customer_reviews.title: Good short scale guitar for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Guitar's build quality was good. It's a short scale guitar, which wasn't something I wanted but just looking at guitar and it's sound, it's a good guitar for those who want to start and prefer short scale.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar for the price. Love to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Whole lotta guitar
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down my favorite guitar now. Classic Strat body, nice finish and hardware and much lighter than my MIA strat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly solid for price
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a beginners guitar. It's surprisingly solid and most people think I'm a real musician when I'm carrying it around, even though I can barely play 2 chords still.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Baber

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t receive a new guitar
customer_reviews.text: I received a used guitar. The strings were not original. There were scratches on everything. Tag was hand tied back together. The action had been lowered and the pick ups had been raised/lowered and were no longer stable. Completely disappointed and had to return which was a hassle. Cannot recommend. Is a shame I really wanted to love this guitar.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Trying to pass off a used product as new
customer_reviews.text: Guitar is clearly used ( see picture) yet marked as a new item – false advertising!
customer_reviews.author: Rishi

customer_reviews.title: A very happy husband and No regretsa!
customer_reviews.text: I got this is a gift for my husband. He absolutely loves it. Is in the first Fender that has ever &owned he was stoked!
customer_reviews.author: Samara Aphid

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low cost - great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: A high quality guitar and excellent value for money for beginners or even an experienced player's addition.
customer_reviews.author: Hylander

customer_reviews.title: great beginner, substantial for intermediate player.
customer_reviews.text: guitar arrived in good condition, set up was ok. It came in working order, needed a bit of touch up on intonation, but overall, highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: Packaged nicely, but guitar had A LOT of scratches upon opening, screws smothered with super glue, black stains. Looks nice from a distance but attention to detail is piss poor. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner guitar. Super easy to play and sounds amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MindHold

customer_reviews.title: Plays nice out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Have played acoustic guitar for many years, but wanted an inexpensive less bulky electric guitarto practice on. Wanted a short-scale due to small hands. Very satisfied with quality of this guitar for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mjmckee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product however the box was damaged and a string broken when we took it out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Cool little beginner guitar. Feels kind of cheap in.my hands but not bad for the money
customer_reviews.author: Matthew litz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the first guitar everyone picks up when they show up to jam
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best low budget guitar
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing low budget guitar. Probably one of the best
customer_reviews.author: Vegetto2012

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice electric guitar. It was a gift for my son and he was very happy!
customer_reviews.author: JORGE PENA TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner/amateur guitar
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar for an amateur who just wants to play for fun occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer2843972729

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This guitar is incredible, and the price is just a bonus. Feels good up and down the neck, and I haven't had any trouble keeping it in tune. I love the Arctic White finish as well, looks as good as it sounds. Even If you decide to do some upgrades, you can throw on new tuners and pickups, and still be a little under half the price of a MIM Strat. Don't let the Squier name turn you away from this guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnell Markward

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS
customer_reviews.text: Bad packaging and the neck was a lighter color wood than the picture shown. Other than that the guitar sounds great!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now you will be very happy
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish on this item was excellent for an inexpensive guitar. As with any guitar you need to do a setup, and after doing it this beauty plays like butter what a great feel and sound. Do you self a favor if you are looking to get an electric guitar buy a Fender you will be very pleased you did.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: A surprisingly well playing instrument!
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad instrument for the price. Made in Indonesia of inexpensive wood - it's quite lite in weight. Weak pick-ups. A great beginner's or hobbyist's guitar - upgrade the pick-ups and you're good to go!
customer_reviews.author: southsidesmoka

product_meta.title: Squier by Fender Bullet Stratocaster Beginner Hard Tail Electric Guitar - HSS - Brown Sunburst
product_meta.description: Style:HSS Stratocaster| Color:Brown Sunburst| Configuration:Laurel FretboardThe newly redesigned Bullet Strat is ideal for first-timer players looking for an easy-to-play, affordable electric guitar. The slim "C"-shaped neck profile offers a comfortable playing experience that is perfect for players with smaller hands. Equipped with a fat-sounding humbucking bridge pickup, two single-coil Stratocaster pickups in the middle and neck positions and five-way switching, the Bullet Strat has the classic Fender sound heard on countless hit records. Its sleek neck provides fast and smooth playability while the improved tuning machines and hardtail bridge ensure rock-solid tuning stability.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars375 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
